title: Glitch
body:
I just redownloaded the game after playing it like once, and whenever i try to launch it, it says leauge of legend in the middle of my screen for a few seconds, than i get this error 
http://imgur.com/a/49sVI
And it says the program has stopped working correctly, i already tryed restarting the game and closing all applications

replies.body: Fixed it, for some reason i had to run it in administrative mode
Ahhhh it sounds like your OS didn't have all the correct permissions in place for League to be recognized as a safe program. Glad you got this back up and running!
